entry.title: Saturday: Chance of light snow. High minus 16. POP 30%
entry.summary: Sunny early this morning then a mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of light snow this afternoon. Wind north 30 km/h. High minus 16. Wind chill minus 36 this morning and minus 25 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 AM CDT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 29.
